segments.text: I see two children near the cupboard, completely focused on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he realizes how dangerous that is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, eagerly waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her open palm, reaching out towards the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching as high as he can to reach into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are both so focused on the cookies that they don't notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it makes me nervous just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware everyone seems to be of the potential dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
